Wolfblade::

She looked at him and the basalt sphere. "Whoah, nice work my friend. 
Well, I'm about done with this mass of metal."  She added a few quick 
final touches and smiled. "There, finished. Now then, after lunch and 
after a small nap, we finish and then we go from there." She walked 
over and patted Malice on the shoulder. "Nice work there big bot."  
She smiled, "You are one heck of a bot my friend."  She turned headed 
to the mess hall. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice heard her and rolled the heavy thing into the lab.  It was 
almost as tall as she was.
> "One basalt sphere, ready for final manufacture, after I take a nap 
and have a meal of energon." 
> He said the latter part sarcastically, for he was quite tired.  He 
was leaning against his handwork, trying to keep his optics open and 
his knees unlocked.
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade::
> 
> She had gone to the lab and worked on the magnet as soon as Malice 
> had left the base. She was putting the finishing touches on it as 
she 
> heard her name being called out. "I'm here in Lab number 5."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice nodded and transformed into his beast mode.  He wanders 
> outside of the base, searching for lava tubes or something.  After 
> about a megacycle of wandering and searching, he finally found a 
> basalt based lava flow and transformed.  He wadded about knee deep 
> and absorbed the heat so he would not melt or warp his legs.  He 
got 
> a hand full of the heavy thick stuff, and drew the heat out, 
leaving 
> a solid mass.  He then dipped it into the lava, pulled it out, and 
> repeated the process until it was halfway up his chest after 
several 
> megacycles.  He rolled it out of the lava stream and began to roll 
it 
> back to the base.
> >  
> >  
> > Two megacycles later, Malice finally rolled the crude sphere like 
> ball into the base.  He rolled it into the cargo bay, and went to 
> find Wolfblade.
> > "Hey Wolfblade, I finished the sphere!  Where are you?"  
> > 
> 
>
